comments:

Deploy->Configure Site...
URL: http://rogue.oti.com:90/html-source
User, pass *** SEE ME ***
Root entry appears in tree.
Click on entry to open tree.
No entries appear below root.
Finish.
Click on Test.
Deploy->Get
